attributes.action: fully investigate why a Cumbrian man was prosecuted after over-filling his wheelie bin by 4 inches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following reports in the national press that a father of three living in the coastal town of Whitehaven has ended up with a crimial record for simply leaving his bin lid open by four inches, we would like to know why this has been allowed to happen? Could more leniency have been shown? Has Copeland Borough Council really got nothing else to do?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
